page.doc.title.message: Bilingual Web Translation Extension_PDF Document Translation Tool

page.doc.keywords.message: translate website,translate pdf,translate web page,pdf translator,translate website to english,translate extension,translate pdf to english,translate pdf document,website translator,pdf translate,translate webpage,translate a pdf,website translate,translate a website,translate a webpage,subtitles translation

page.doc.description.message: Immersive Translate is a free website translate extension that provides you with online bilingual web page translation. Can be used to translate website to english or other languages, translation of documents in various formats, PDF translation, translation of EPUB e-books, translation of bilingual subtitles for videos (support for Youtube, Netflix and other mainstream video sites), translation of TXT and other file translation services. (Chrome, Edge, Firefox, Safari and other mainstream browsers, cell phones and computers can be installed and used. Support English, Spanish, Chinese, French, German, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese, Vietnamese, Indonesian, Italian, Dutch, Thai and dozens of other languages. Support multiple translator API : DeepL Translator, Google Translator, Open AI (ChatGPT),Gemini, Artificial Intelligence Translation, Youdao Translator, LingoCloud Translator, Baidu Translator, Volcengine Translator, Niutrans Translator, and so on. It is the webpage translation extension tool that understands you the most and provides you with the most silky smooth website translation experience.

page.index.headTitle.message: Immersive Translate - Bilingual Webpage Translation Extension_PDF Document Translation Tool

page.index.title.message: Immersive Translate: Highly Rated Bilingual Translate Website Extension

page.index.description.message:
You can use it entirely for free to translate foreign language website, translate PDF document, translate EPUB ebook, generate bilingual subtitles for video.
Moreover, you have the freedom to select from artificial intelligence engines such as OpenAI (ChatGPT), DeepL, Gemini, for translating the aforementioned content.
It's also conveniently available on your smartphone, allowing you to break down information barriers anytime, anywhere. Simply choose the platform below to start your experience immediately :)

page.usegescenarios.meta.title.message: Bilingual webpage translation -eBook translation - PDF translation - Subtitle file translation browser extension

page.usegescenarios.meta.desc.message: Immersive Translate is a browser extension that intelligently recognizes the main content of web pages for bilingual translation. The extension supports all major browsers, translation of PDF files, bilingual translation, creation, and export of EPUB eBooks, as well as subtitle file translation, and more.

page.usegescenarios.title.message:
Scenarios for Immersive Translate
A Day in the Life of Xiao Zhang

page.usegescenarios.desc.message: We hope that through Xiao Zhang's story, we can show you more usage scenarios so that Immersive Translate can provide more value in your work and daily life.

page.usegescenarios.content1.desc.message: Xiao Zhang begins his day by cultivating the habit of accessing firsthand information from globally recognized media sources, including Reuters, The New York Times, The Economist, and The Atlantic—frequent destinations for his news updates. His go-to platforms for foreign content navigation are Kadaza.com and Buzzing.cc. Thanks to the paragraph bilingual comparison feature in Immersive Translate, his reading efficiency has greatly improved. When faced with subpar translation, he can seamlessly refer to the original text to better understand the information.

page.usegescenarios.content2.desc.message: The input box translation feature of Immersive Translate has brought great convenience to Xiao Zhang. He only needs to enter a Chinese question in the Google search box, then triple-click the spacebar, and the question in the search box will be immediately translated into English. Coupled with the bilingual translation of search results, Xiao Zhang's efficiency in searching for information has reached unprecedented heights!

page.usegescenarios.content3.desc.message: In this era of AI, Xiao Zhang spends each day conversing on platforms like ChatGPT, Bard, Discord, Telegram, engaging with both machines and real people. Thanks to Immersive Translate, any webpage's input box transforms into a robust multilingual translator. Consequently, Xiao Zhang's Chinese queries are swiftly translated into English and sent to ChatGPT, and the responses from ChatGPT are seamlessly translated back into Chinese in real-time.

page.usegescenarios.content4.desc.message: At work, Xiao Zhang prefers to use the desktop version of the Chrome browser to access the latest global financial and technological information. He closely follows exclusive news from financial media such as Bloomberg, Yahoo Finance, The Wall Street Journal, and the Financial Times. Recently, he has been paying attention to the performance of Nvidia and Bitcoin, both of which have been quite impressive. With the help of Immersive Translate, he can effortlessly read various financial reports, announcements, and research papers in both languages, allowing him to stay ahead and obtain important financial information before others.

page.usegescenarios.content5.title.message: 12:30, catch up on some overseas social media highlights.

page.usegescenarios.content5.desc.message: During breaks, Xiao Zhang uses Immersive Translate on his mobile device (such as Safari browser on iOS or Firefox browser on Android). He browses international mainstream social media platforms like Twitter, Reddit, and YouTube, engaging in discussions with global thought leaders. He accurately captures every important piece of information, ensuring that he stays at the forefront of knowledge.

page.usegescenarios.content6.desc.message: Xiao Zhang has also noticed that the quality of English Wikipedia is much higher than that of other languages. Therefore, he frequently utilizes both languages to acquire any knowledge of interest on English Wikipedia, whether he has specific tasks at hand or not.

page.usegescenarios.content7.desc.message: Sometimes, Xiao Zhang reads the latest PDF papers on arXiv. With the innovative real-time translation feature of Immersive Translate for PDF files, he can instantly grasp the latest academic news.

page.usegescenarios.content8.desc.message: Xiao Zhang is also passionate about reading. He often explores the latest books on the foreign book discovery platform, GoodReads, checking reviews and patiently waiting for the Chinese versions of these foreign language books to be available. However, starting last month, he has been directly purchasing the English version of Chip War (Chinese title: 芯片战争) from Google Books. He then seamlessly uploads it to Immersive Translate, exports it to his Kindle, and begins reading the bilingual e-book.

page.usegescenarios.content9.title.message: 21:00, watch American Tv shows, browse YouTube, and enjoy Ted Talks!

page.usegescenarios.content9.desc.message: Sometimes, Xiao Zhang also follows American Tv shows. Previously, he had to patiently wait for subtitle groups to translate, but now he can use Immersive Translate to generate bilingual subtitles for any subtitle file with just one click, allowing him to keep up with global audiences. Immersive Translate also thoughtfully supports real-time translation of subtitles for YouTube online videos. Xiao Zhang can watch Ted Talks on YouTube, interact with other viewers in the comment section, and enjoy American Tv shows with synchronized bilingual subtitles, eliminating the need for waiting.

page.usegescenarios.content10.title.message: 23:00, enjoy some happy online shopping before bedtime

page.usegescenarios.content10.desc.message: The annual Black Friday shopping event is Xiao Zhang's most anticipated global online shopping extravaganza. He thoroughly researches the features, prices, and real user reviews of each product on Amazon and eBay. Immersive Translate makes everything easy, helping Xiao Zhang make the most cost-effective shopping decisions.

page.features.videoSubtitle.page.title.message: Free online video bilingual subtitle translator (Youtube, NetFlix, etc.) - Immersive Translate

page.features.videoSubtitle.page.keyword.message: subtitle translator,translate subtitles,subtitle translate,subtitles translator,translate video to english subtitles

page.features.videoSubtitle.page.descrip.message: Video bilingual translation, youtub translation, video bilingual subtitles, video translation extension

page.features.videoSubtitle.content.titl.message: Online Video Bilingual Subtitle Translat Function Introduction

page.features.videoSubtitle.content.desc.message: Immersive Translate Extension provides free online video bilingual subtitle translation service, supporting a broad spectrum of mainstream video platforms (Youtube , NetFlix , Twitter Spaces , HBO Max , Vimeo , Khan Academy , Coursera , Udemy , Bloomberg , Nebula , Bilibili . TED and dozens of other mainstream video sites, with the list continuously expanding). It supports bilingual subtitle translation in dozens of languages and displays them in real time according to the video process, for example, you can watch Youtube and NetFlix videos with Spanish and English subtitles, and instant subtitles are automatically generated and translated in real time, and bilingual subtitle control will take you across the language barrier, and collide with ideas in various languages all over the world.

page.features.videoSubtitle.content.intr.message: Get almost instant translation of video subtitles to help you quickly understand the content of foreign language videos.
No longer limited to a single subtitle language provided by the video station, multiple language pairs are supported for translation.
The extension is easy to use, check the box "Automatically turn on bilingual subtitles" and watch videos with bilingual subtitles anytime, anywhere.
Except for some video stations that do not support mobile subtitles, the extension supports multi-end use (e.g., cell phones, tablets, computers, etc.).

page.features.videoSubtitle.content.usag.message: Language learners can improve their language skills by watching the original video content, with real-time translation to aid comprehension.
Students can watch educational videos in other languages and better understand course content through bilingual subtitles.
When viewers watch foreign language movies and TV shows, the software will translate them into bilingual subtitles in real time, so everyone can no longer be limited by the language barrier.
People can use the software to watch video content from other cultures and countries, promoting cultural understanding and exchange.
Travelers can learn about local culture and language habits in advance by watching video content from the destination country.
Users can watch foreign news reports and current affairs programs, even if they do not provide subtitles in the local language.
Corporate researchers can watch advertisements and promotional videos from foreign markets to better understand competitors and market dynamics.

page.features.howtouse.installstep.desc.message: More installation details can be found at here

page.features.howtouse.videoSubtitle.ste.message: 3. Turn on the subtitles at the video station.

page.features.downloadnow.message: Immersive Translate supports multiple platforms, get started now!

page.features.shareBilingualContent.cont.message: Bilingual Content Sharing - Immersive Translate
Immersive Translate supports the sharing of translated bilingual content, and the sharing content can maintain the style of the source site to help people discover more quality content.
Easy to Learn
For users who are learning a language, sharing bilingual pages can help them communicate with and learn from their study partners, thus improving the efficiency of language learning.
Promote Exchanges
Users can share the translated content with friends from different language backgrounds to promote cross-cultural communication and understanding.
Aave Time
Instead of having to translate the same web content again, other users can access the bilingual content directly through the shared link, saving time.
Convenient and Fast
Users can quickly share bilingual pages via social media, email or instant messenger with ease.
Content Backup
Users can save important bilingual content on other platforms to use as backup through the sharing function.
Educational Learning
Students can share the bilingual page with their classmates or teachers so that they can compare the original text and the translation to deepen their understanding when studying a foreign language.
Travel Planning
Travelers can share travel information or tips for their destination in bilingual form to fellow travelers for easy trip planning.
Story
News practitioners or readers can share bilingual cross-references of international news to help readers better understand what foreign media are reporting.
Social Media
Users can share interesting or important bilingual web content on social media, appealing to a wider bilingual readership.
Academic Research
Researchers can share bilingual summaries of academic papers or research reports to help their international peers quickly grasp the gist of their research.
Immigration Services
Immigration service organizations can share bilingual pages on government policies, laws and regulations to help new immigrants better understand and adapt to their new environment.

page.features.pdfTralslate.page.title.message: Free Translate PDF Document & ePub eBook Function Introduction - Immersive Translate

page.features.pdfTralslate.page.keywords.message: translate pdf,pdf translator,translate pdf to english,translate pdf document,pdf translate,translate a pdf,how to translate a pdf,pdf document translator,translate a pdf document,translate a pdf to english,pdf translate to english,pdf translation,translate german to english pdf,pdf english translator,translate pdf to spanish,translate from a pdf,translate pdf document to english,how to translate pdf,translate pdf documents,translate pdf english,free pdf translator

page.features.pdfTralslate.page.descript.message: The Immersive Translate Extension offers a free online PDF translator service. It can be used to translate PDF documents and ePub eBooks into English, Spanish, or any other language. The translated document will retain the original layout, supporting bilingual document translation and allowing users to customize their choice between downloading a document with bilingual translation or a purely translated version. Applicable scenarios include, but are not limited to, the translation of foreign language literature, academic theses, product manuals, legal contracts, and more, for both PDF and ePub formats. Additionally, users can choose from a variety of mainstream translation engines, including OpenAI (ChatGPT), DeepL, Gemini, and other widely recognized artificial intelligence translation engines, to ensure more accurate translation of specialized documents.

page.features.pdfTralslate.content.title.message: Translate PDF & EPUB eBooks Function Introduction

page.features.pdfTralslate.content.descr.message:
Immersion Translate provides a complimentary online service for translating PDF and ePub ebook. It ensures the original document's formatting is preserved and offers the flexibility to download either bilingual comparative translations or solely the translated text.
This service is designed for a broad spectrum of uses, including but not limited to the translation of foreign literature PDFs, academic theses, product manuals, foreign contracts.
With access to a selection of leading translation engines, users can opt for OpenAI (ChatGPT), DeepL, Gemini, and other highly acclaimed artificial intelligence translation engines for more precise translations of specialized documents.

page.features.pdfTralslate.content.intro.message: Bilingual cross-referenced displays can help users better understand the correspondence between the original content and the translated text, especially when learning a new language.
Users save a lot of time and effort by not having to switch between different documents or applications to cross-reference the original text and translation.
Translation results are displayed directly next to the original text, making it easy for users to proofread and compare, and to quickly consult the original text when translation problems arise.

Translate PDF content to maintain the original format basically unchanged, on top of which also provides the content display size customization, more conducive to the acquisition of complete information.
It can be used in a variety of contexts, such as academic research, business reports, legal documents, etc., where controlled reading is particularly important.

page.features.pdfTralslate.content.usage.message: Academic Research
Researchers can use the software to translate foreign-language literature to better understand and cite international academic resources.
International Business
Business people can translate contracts, reports and other business documents to ensure an accurate understanding of the content of partners' documents in cross-border transactions.
Legal Practice
Lawyers or legal practitioners can translate legal documents and case materials to help with international legal matters.
Educational Learning
Students and teachers can translate textbooks, academic papers or teaching materials to support language learning or teaching in international programs.
Travel Guide
Travelers can translate guidebooks and maps to help them better understand local information when traveling abroad.
Immigration Documents
An immigrant or refugee can translate important personal documents such as birth certificates, marriage certificates, etc. for use in the application process.
Cultural Exchange
Translation of literary works, art criticism or historical documents to promote understanding and exchange between cultures.
Technical Manuals
Engineers and technicians can translate operating manuals and technical specifications to help them operate and maintain equipment purchased abroad.
News Media
Reporters and editors can translate foreign news stories and articles to provide readers with a broader international perspective.
Conferences and Seminars
Organizers can translate conference materials and presentations to enable participants to cross language barriers and participate more effectively in discussions.

page.features.howtouse.pdfTralslate.step.message: 3. Drag in the local PDF file, the plug-in will be automatically bilingual cross-translation

page.index.InValidChrome.message: Chrome kernel version {version} is too low, please upgrade your browser to the latest version

page.download.title.message: Enable bilingual reading with one click, enhancing information acquisition efficiency

page.download.subtitle.message: The term "Immersive Translate" was coined by us. Today, it has become synonymous with "bilingual contrastive translation." Since its launch in 2023, this acclaimed AI bilingual webpage translation extension has helped over a million users overcome language barriers and freely access global knowledge. We believe that breaking down language barriers promotes information equity.

page.download.web.subtitle.message: We have successfully popularized the bilingual webpage reading experience among millions of users. As a leader in the industry, Immersive Translate incorporates over 10 of the top translation engines in the industry, including DeepL, OpenAI, and Google Translate, making it the tool with the most supported translation engines among all similar products worldwide.

page.download.videoSub.subtitle.message: Immersive Translate was the first to support bilingual real-time subtitles for over 50 mainstream foreign video sites. With bilingual subtitles, you can fully understand the video content and naturally learn a foreign language while watching. The authentic foreign language audio combined with subtitles in your mother tongue helps you improve your listening, speaking, reading, and writing skills subtly.

page.download.pdf.subtitle.message: Immersive Translate innovatively introduced a free PDF document contrastive translation feature in the browser plugin. Whether you need to read foreign academic papers or handle multilingual business documents, you can obtain high-quality translation results with a single click through Immersive Translate.

page.download.pdfpro.subtitle.message: Immersive translation AI-driven PDF Translation is designed to handle the most complex PDF files, whether they are academic papers full of professional terminology, or various documents containing complex tables and images. The AI-driven PDF parsing technology can ensure efficient and accurate parsing of these contents.

page.download.ePub.subtitle.message: With Immersive Translate, creating bilingual ePub ebooks has never been easier! Our one-click ebook creation feature instantly transforms your foreign language ebooks into elegant bilingual versions, allowing you to enjoy an immersive reading experience on various e-readers.

page.download.mouse.subtitle.message: Immersive Translate brings another revolutionary interaction innovation—mouseover translation. Simply hover your mouse over any paragraph and press the preset shortcut key (such as Ctrl), and the translation of the current paragraph will immediately appear after the paragraph.

page.download.input.subtitle.message: Directly enter text in any input box (such as "hello world"), quickly press the space bar three times, and the text will be translated into the target language (default English, customizable). This innovative interaction mode is suitable for search, writing, dialogue, and other types of pages, allowing you to complete translations instantly without switching.

page.viewDownload.title.message: Immersive Translate, one-click to enable bilingual reading

page.index.downloadBtn.orUseOnMobile.message: Or use it directly on the mobile phone.

pro.introduction.title.message: Reshape your {{pdf}} document translation experience with {{ai}}.

pro.advantage.formula.description.message: With the help of advanced AI technology, even the most complex mathematical and scientific formulas can be accurately recognized and translated.

pro.advantage.table.description.message: We deeply understand the importance of tables in PDFs, and the AI capabilities we use have been extensively optimized for tables. They can seamlessly recognize and translate tables in documents.

pro.advantage.ocr.description.message: Using the latest OCR (Optical Character Recognition) technology, our PDF translation can recognize text from images and convert it into editable, translatable text.

pro.advantage.columns.description.message: Our PDF translation tool is specifically designed to support dual-column and triple-column layouts, capable of recognizing and adapting to complex layouts in documents. This means that even the most complex academic papers can be accurately parsed and translated by our system.

pro.feat.html.description.message: Our principle is to perfectly convert PDF to HTML and then translate it. So you can save the translated HTML for easy reading on any device.

pro.feat.pdf.description.message: We support exporting the translated document as a new PDF, ensuring your document maintains a professional appearance and reading experience on any platform.

pro.feat.share.description.message: By generating an accessible link to a bilingual snapshot, you can easily share the translated document with anyone.

page.feature.pro.compare.title.message: AI-driven PDF Pro translation versus ordinary PDF translation:

pro.pdf.desc.message: Designed specifically to handle the most complex PDF files, whether they are academic papers full of professional terminology, or various documents containing complex tables and images, AI-driven PDF parsing technology can ensure efficient and accurate parsing of these contents (*only available for Pro members).

page.exchange.pricingTitle.message: Say goodbye to ordinary machine translation!

page.exchange.pricingSubtitle.message: Upgrade to Pro membership now and enjoy the precise, smooth, and natural reading experience provided by DeepL and OpenAI.

page.topup.pricingTitle.message: Say goodbye to ordinary machine translation!

page.topup.pricingSubtitle.message: Data add-on package, continue to enjoy precise, smooth, and natural reading experience.

page.zipinstall.title.message: Immersive Translation Chrome Extension Local Installation Guide

page.zipinstall.copyandpaste.message: Copy the following address and paste it into the browser address bar, press enter to open, and turn on developer mode in the upper right corner.

page.zipinstall.step1Title.message: Download the immersive translation crx installation package and unzip it (the crx file is in the unzipped folder).

page.zipinstall.step2Title.message: Open the "Manage Extensions" page in Chrome and turn on "Developer Mode".

page.zipinstall.step4Title.message: Pin the immersive translation plugin to the browser toolbar for easy access at any time (when you need to update the plugin next time, you can update it by going through this process again).

page.manualinstall.title.message: Immersive Translation Chrome Extension Local Installation Guide

page.manualinstall.description.message: If you are unable to install the immersive translation plugin through the Chrome store, you can try to manually install it following this tutorial.

page.pricing.header.normal.subtitle3.message: Continued use indicates your agreement to the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
